Ken(Wen Zuojun) Resum

This is Ken's achievements/h2>

At present, I still hold the position of head of student union office in Ningbo City Institute of technology. In this position, I need to communicate with many students. So I think I have an advantage in interpersonal communication. I also won the title of excellent staff in the student union. In addition, I also participated in the "Ningbo Gang" development conference organized by Ningbo municipal government, in which I won the title of excellent volunteer.
